name: Physics animation
description:
What if regular layers on Figma could turn into an animation with real physics? Physics animation plugin does exactly that. Yes, I kid you not, sir! No special skills needed. Exporting in webm, GIF and SVG formats is available.


Here you could find the library of templates to be used via plugin. It helps to understand how plugin works.
